Questions.Question_2: What is up with the name?

Answers.Answer_1: This is my personal site used for blogging and to display the projects that I've been working on.
Answers.Answer_2: I picked the name in order to be more honest with myself. As a human being, I feel that I've always been wanting to be better than what I am now, but I've always been unable to take that next step. I'm going to stop avoiding/procrastinating the challenges that I need to face in order to achieve my goals.
Answers.Answer_3: I go by Ding or Dingie on the internet. I'm just a programmer who is trying to pursue the realm of machine learning and artifical intelligence.
Answers.Answer_4: My day to day is spent learning about programming and honing this craft.
Answers.Answer_5: I want to be proficient in the field of machine learning. To be able to create and build projects from scratch that will be beneficial to the people I know.
Answers.Answer_6: In my spare time, I enjoy playing League of Legends. As for something outside of the computer, I love ice-skating and hiking.
